lead_paragraph: LEAD: Los Angeles may be fantasy enough, but for a truly otherworldly experience take the 115-mile drive to the Tehachapi Pass wind farms. The mountainous pass, which serves as a funnel through which powerful winds whip into the Mojave Desert below, is covered with huge windmills that generate electric power for Southern California.

headline.main: California: The great wind farms of the Tehachapi Pass
headline.kicker: EIGHT AUTO TRIPS: FROM BACK ROADS...TO TOWERING MOUNTAIN PASSES
